original_text: knowing that whatever good anyone does, this he will receive back from the Lord, whether he is a bondservant or is free.
korean_text: 이는 각 사람이 무슨 선을 행하든지 종이나 자유인이나 주께로부터 그대로 받을 줄을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: knowing that whatever good anyone does
this he will receive back from the Lord
whether he is a bondservant or is free
